tool_description: This API will give you latest news only about Pakistan politics.
name: Pakistan News API
title: Pakistan News API

api_list.name: Get Pakistan News
api_list.description: All the latest news about Pakistan
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pakistan-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/pakistan"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pakistan-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pakistan-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/pakistan"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pakistan-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

test_endpoint.messages: The request to the API has timed out. Please try again later, or if the issue persists, please contact the API provider
test_endpoint.info: Your Client (working) ---> Gateway (working) ---> API (took too long to respond)
